solution.text:
Surface area of the wall\(=_{{trunc(((2/Decimal(10000))*pi_val*(j/Decimal(2))*k*l),3)}}_m^2\)
Cost of painting the wall \(=\) Surface area of the wall \(\times\) rate
\(=_{{trunc(((2/Decimal(10000))*pi_val*(j/Decimal(2))*k*l),3)}}_ \times 250\)
\(=_{{trunc(((2/Decimal(10000))*pi_val*(j/Decimal(2))*k*l*250),3)}}_\) rupees

content.text: Find the cost of painting the wall at Rs.\(250\) per sq.m.
